entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Flurries over higher terrain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
